import React from 'react'; import BookReview from './BookReview' function BookCard({book, onBookClick, reviews}){ const {id, description, genre, author, title} = book function handleClick(e){ e.preventDefault() onBookClick(book) console.log(book) } return(

{title}

{author}

{description}
{genre}
) } export default BookCard;
